meanings.meaning: what became, has become, will become of somebody/something?

vlive.korean: 될 겁니다. You will succeed. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : 언타이틀 - '임도혁 + 헤일로와 함께하는 언타이틀'
잘 될 겁니다 화이팅! Everything will turn out well! Fighting! 듣기 View video iKON : ㄱㄱ
vlive.english: Everything will turn out well! Fighting!

vlive.korean: 여러분들 힘내시고 잘 될 겁니다 이거는 제가... Cheer up, everyone! Everything will be fine. 듣기 View video BTS : 슈가의 인털루드
vlive.english: Cheer up, everyone! Everything will be fine.

vlive.korean: 조만간! 중국 측에서 기부가 될 겁니다. In a little bit, the money will be donated in China. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: In a little bit, the money will be donated in China.

vlive.korean: 근데 저희 또 하다 보면 악어가 될 겁니다! We are going to become alligators the more we do it! 듣기 View video CIX : 서기의 깜짝라이브😛
vlive.english: We are going to become alligators the more we do it!

examples.korean: This should help (to) reduce the pain. 발음듣기 이것이 통증 완화에 도움이 될 겁니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This should help (to) reduce the pain. 발음

examples.korean: If you enjoy the coast and the country, you’ll get the best of both worlds on this walk. 발음듣기 당신이 해안과 시골 지역을 즐긴다면 이번 걷기 여행이 당신에게는 일거양득의 기회가 될 겁니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you enjoy the coast and the country, you’ll get the best of both worlds on this walk. 발음

examples.korean: Aspirin should help reduce the fever. 발음듣기 아스피린이 열을 내리는 데 도움이 될 겁니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Aspirin should help reduce the fever. 발음

examples.korean: You should receive a reply within seven days. 발음듣기 당신은 7일 이내에 답장을 받게 될 겁니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You should receive a reply within seven days. 발음

examples.korean: You’ll be relieved to know your jobs are safe. 발음듣기 당신들의 일자리가 안전하다는 것을 알면 안도가 될 겁니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ll be relieved to know your jobs are safe. 발음
